SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="c27c68abf36942b7a88953119b25e607" Scale="0.9946237"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Grrr,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that DIRECTOR![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can't believe I let
him drag me out here![etc:Wait frame="15"/] "We'll film a new
project," he says.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "It'll be amazing," he says.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c27c68abf36942b7a88953119b25e607" Scale="0.9946237"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Please![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We get here and the spaceship
CRASHES?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Seriously?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I mean,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] sure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it'll
make for great television...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c27c68abf36942b7a88953119b25e607" Scale="0.9946237"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Ugh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but still...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]even if I wanted to start
shooting footage,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I don't have a crew...
[etc:Wait frame="15"/]because my crew is still STRANDED!
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="b9a22c1b79dd424a88ad5ac8e75077ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sorry—I went off script there
for a second.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Wait...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]aren't you the one who
rescued me?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b9a22c1b79dd424a88ad5ac8e75077ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]OK,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal17"/]Muggs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You might know me
from television.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm a reporter.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b9a22c1b79dd424a88ad5ac8e75077ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] hey![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I just had a brilliant idea...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b9a22c1b79dd424a88ad5ac8e75077ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]Since you have a knack for rescuing folks,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
could you [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]look for the rest of my TV crew
[System:Color name="Default"]too?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You'll be handsomely rewarded.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="0f4450fcd6e14ee3beb7b42edaf13c40" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Well, well, well![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Aren't you ridiculously
attractive![etc:Wait frame="15"/] In fact,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd say you've got a
face made for TV.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="9e3838efc39d4189accb2038bb17064c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Tell me—what is it you're demanding from
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9e3838efc39d4189accb2038bb17064c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSurpriseNoVoice"/]Is that right?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You want Scrummy Bones,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
you say?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You demand MORE?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm going
to quote you on that.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="d352c1e84a6543b99082d1e88e45acc7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Excuse me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] is there anything you'd like to
say to [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d352c1e84a6543b99082d1e88e45acc7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly2"/]Oh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Is that right?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]hungry?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Shocking news indeed!
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="7f542329068046c5a7a5c0285ace0d7f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]You rescued all of my crew members![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Now, that's the kind of action I expect
from a member of the Rescue Corps![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7f542329068046c5a7a5c0285ace0d7f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Anyway,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] here's that reward I promised.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Seriously,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thank you.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="5e680cc766b14215b20b0acb680a228a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Our camera is broken, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]so we won't be
capturing any new footage for a while.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5e680cc766b14215b20b0acb680a228a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Still,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that director of mine...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He's probably
cooking up some kind of a scheme to get
good footage.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yeah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he definitely is.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Intro_00b:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="416152c6aef544d3835f7114adc17215" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Hey![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Can I get your attention for a sec?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I got dragged to this planet on promises of
shooting a hot new project...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="416152c6aef544d3835f7114adc17215" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But then we got here and the ship crashed.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
CRASHED![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm telling you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] everything this
guy gets involved with goes sideways!
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="b68811de029e421ba284e4a9ce133046" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Bah![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sorry.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I went off script there...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Wait—aren't you the one who rescued me?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b68811de029e421ba284e4a9ce133046" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]OK, well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal17"/]Muggs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You might know me
from television.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm a reporter.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm sure
I look familiar.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b68811de029e421ba284e4a9ce133046" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Of course,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the most important thing is
you saved everyone in my crew!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="3c1b5ea2042846b5a906ccfd423c623b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Talk about quick work![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Now, that's how a
member of the Rescue Corps is supposed
to act.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3c1b5ea2042846b5a906ccfd423c623b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Such speedy work could land you a job in
my industry.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You should join us.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We could
use a good production assistant.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="6ecf3e6344b246d4871c2d099df9a0d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I joined the company with big plans to be a
news anchor.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But somehow I ended up a
reporter on the culture desk.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6ecf3e6344b246d4871c2d099df9a0d6" Scale="1"/]When they told me there was this "hot new
project,"[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I figured it was the same old
"SHOCKING NEW DETAILS!" nonsense.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6ecf3e6344b246d4871c2d099df9a0d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]See,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my director has been feeling stuck in
a rut lately,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6ecf3e6344b246d4871c2d099df9a0d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Wait—CUT! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Never mind,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I made that all up.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Cut out that last part.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Cut everything!
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="64b8ba4723aa4e2a8dec6e3efc566fb1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yeah, no...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Even if I wanted to get
footage,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's no camera.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="3d9c1e71c97b46d2b6590a8207580ef6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If we do start shooting again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll have to
listen to the director go blah-blah-blah a
bunch,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so maybe this isn't so bad.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="3b5f90c3b8374460a8621175a52e3196" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'm a reporter, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]a REAL reporter,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not
just some amateur hack.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="4f9f4cc0eaa042a7a6942c6aeb97b630" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I see...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You saved my musician,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] huh?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4f9f4cc0eaa042a7a6942c6aeb97b630" Scale="1"/]So next up is the opera singer,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and then...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4f9f4cc0eaa042a7a6942c6aeb97b630" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]My director.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's just...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]he's never there
when you really need him,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I just feel so—[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4f9f4cc0eaa042a7a6942c6aeb97b630" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Gah![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Forget it![etc:Wait frame="8"/] What I said...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]that was off
the record.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Way OFF![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Please?
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="d7573c89f0d847ec831c04f2b34c57b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]It is NOT easy having a conversation with
our musical genius.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's like you're trying to
play a duet, but he's performing a big solo.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d7573c89f0d847ec831c04f2b34c57b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Great,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just great.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now I'm starting to
sound like him!
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="8a3c53be90d44a92a471f1d8d10a6d26" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]But, I mean,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's not like he's a bad person,
or anything.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="73dfdd54aff64c87b0269b8bff5f6e24" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]The deal is I want to be a newsroom
anchor.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's the dream.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] My dream.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="73dfdd54aff64c87b0269b8bff5f6e24" Scale="1"/]But my crew right now...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's just
say I'm stuck on the culture desk for
a reason.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="8d607e2f60914fa193a15e9b05332297" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you only have my director left
to rescue,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] huh?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8d607e2f60914fa193a15e9b05332297" Scale="1"/]I swear,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] everything he touches turns
to chaos![etc:Wait frame="15"/] He's impulsive and he's
wishy-washy...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8d607e2f60914fa193a15e9b05332297" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Seriously,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you wouldn't believe how much
time I spend worrying about him![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8d607e2f60914fa193a15e9b05332297" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Wait...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]no, no, no![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I didn't say that, and
you didn't hear that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] ANY of that![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8d607e2f60914fa193a15e9b05332297" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] uh...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yay,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] only one crew member left
to rescue![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's wrap it up, please
and thank you.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="9911a591aea64afe8716b74a01e41d2e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]My director is always—ALWAYS—making
the most unreasonable and totally
ridiculous requests.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="9380b3881a55476ebd301e2e7cf7e710" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]And the things he does...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]also totally
ridiculous.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm telling you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that guy is
really...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]something.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="22fd1a25d60e4e8e82ba5fe667ebb204" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]So yes, of course I'm worried.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="22fd1a25d60e4e8e82ba5fe667ebb204" Scale="1"/]Seriously.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He's such a...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]goofball.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="9adf7074ec834110a338d9b6c131e4a1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Wait...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]what? [etc:Wait frame="8"/]My director told you to...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
"dive into a herd of Bulborbs"?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9adf7074ec834110a338d9b6c131e4a1" Scale="1"/]Ugh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sure it was for some ratings-
grabbing bit he was dreaming up.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9adf7074ec834110a338d9b6c131e4a1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly"/]Though...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]now that I think about it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that
could make for some interesting television.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9adf7074ec834110a338d9b6c131e4a1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]No![etc:Wait frame="15"/] No, no, no![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a terrible idea.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
As always.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yeah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] anyway,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] good luck
out there.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="fa41ab81240f472f8609356ffcef7dfc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]That's a wrap!
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="5b2e27222c944945ac01b18f1b3498d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]So, uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] how do I say this...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We have
breaking news![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It appears that I am...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5b2e27222c944945ac01b18f1b3498d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]ENGAGED![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Hahaha,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can you believe it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] engaged![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5b2e27222c944945ac01b18f1b3498d5" Scale="1"/]Who popped the question?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My director,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
of course![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Surprise![etc:Wait frame="15"/] To quote him directly...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5b2e27222c944945ac01b18f1b3498d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]"If I'm going to capture the most intense
and awesome footage on a faraway
planet...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]all I really need is you!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5b2e27222c944945ac01b18f1b3498d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Yeah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] sometimes it just takes him a while
to figure things out.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But here we are![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Anyway,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's the news flash.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="77cf6e3fa6974964a20bc6935e52cf7b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Good work,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] everyone![etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's a wrap!
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="0f3b046c71b34ecf96163ef55cb09c21" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]We're announcing a project called "Inside
the Menacing Death Planet!"[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We're gonna
hit Enohee with some REAL journalism.
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="fc7f27dd2955484c9d8d37244a2b92b6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Just think of all the exclusive scoops we'll
come back from here with![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yesss!
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="a7839d74c93248ccb4f762ccd11232f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Hmm?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And how do I feel about the
proposal?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Was it everything I hoped
it would be?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a7839d74c93248ccb4f762ccd11232f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think I'm going to say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "No comment
at this time!"
SV016.SV016_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="ac4626e6d9f7483cb22170e511e1d7d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]The deal is I want to be a newsroom
anchor.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's the dream.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] My dream.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ac4626e6d9f7483cb22170e511e1d7d0" Scale="1"/]But my crew right now...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's just
say I'm stuck on the culture desk for
a reason.
